title: Templo de Debod Sunset Walk
knownFor: One of Madrid's most romantic walks, featuring an ancient Egyptian temple, spectacular sunset views, and ending at the Royal Palace gardens. Perfect for golden hour photography.
route: From Puente de Segovia → Palace gardens → Cuesta de San Vicente → Calle de Ferraz → Templo de Debod (sunset) → Plaza de España → Royal Palace → Jardines in front of Opera
